rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0010
rows.name: Finally awake?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0020
rows.name: Doesn't look like you broke anything...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0030
rows.name: All good?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0040
rows.name: Great. That makes two of us, and that's the bright side.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0050
rows.name: That said...it's not looking too rosy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0060
rows.name: Look.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0070
rows.name:
We've been scattered...
I think Void must be playing for time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0090
rows.name: Back there, well...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0100
rows.name: Somehow...Void was able to capture Al and the Ares.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0101
rows.name:
We're missing our companions,
and our Skells are grounded somewhere too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0102
rows.name: He's put our backs against the wall...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_JNK0103
rows.name: Stay Hopeful

rows.label: xs33180100_SEL0104
rows.name:
Propose that the first order of business
should be to rendezvous with your allies.

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0105
rows.name: Yes, that's just what I thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_JNK0106
rows.name: Despair

rows.label: xs33180100_SEL0107
rows.name: Whimper that it's all over.

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0108
rows.name: Stop it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0109
rows.name: All's not lost yet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0110
rows.name: Void's powerful,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0120
rows.name: but even he'll need some time[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0125
rows.name: before he can activate all the cores.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0230
rows.name: Let's scout out the area and see if we can find the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0240
rows.name:
It shouldn't be too hard to follow the location data
from their emergency beacons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0250
rows.name: Our Skells should have performed their emergency landings too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0260
rows.name:
Having them would make the search easier,
so we might want to look for them first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs33180100_MSG0270
rows.name: In any case, don't panic. Let's handle this one step at a time.[ST:wait ]
